profile.terms.title: Terms of Use
profile.terms.subtitle: View the app terms of use
profile.terms.intro: Welcome to the appointments management app. Your use of the app and related services is subject to the terms detailed in this document and constitutes full and informed consent to all its provisions.
profile.terms.section1.title: 1. Account Creation and Identification
profile.terms.section1.body: To use the services, you may be required to provide identifying information such as name and phone number. You declare that the information provided is accurate and up to date and will update it as needed. Do not use another person's details without their permission.
profile.terms.section2.title: 2. Booking and Changes
profile.terms.section2.body: Booking, changes, or cancellation are done through the app subject to availability. The confirmed appointment details will be displayed in the app and sent as a notification per settings. Service times are approximate and may change due to operational constraints.
profile.terms.section3.title: 3. Cancellations and No-Shows
profile.terms.section3.body: You may cancel or change an appointment within a reasonable time before its scheduled time. No-shows or significant delays may result in future restrictions on booking, at the business's discretion.
profile.terms.section4.title: 4. Payments and Receipts
profile.terms.section4.body: If payment is made through the app, it may be processed via third-party payment providers. Payment method details are not stored on our servers beyond what is necessary to complete the transaction. If payment is made at the business, it will be settled directly between you and the business.
profile.terms.section5.title: 5. Notifications and Messaging
profile.terms.section5.body: You can enable or disable notifications from the app or through device settings. Disabling notifications may affect receiving reminders and important updates.
profile.terms.section6.title: 6. Privacy and Data Security
profile.terms.section6.body: We may collect and process information necessary to operate the service, including basic identification information and appointment data. Information is stored and processed in accordance with applicable law and the privacy policy. You may contact us to review, update, or delete personal information, subject to our legal obligations.
profile.terms.section7.title: 7. Permitted Use and Conduct
profile.terms.section7.body: Do not use the service in a way that infringes on others' rights, violates the law, or disrupts app operations. We may limit or block access in cases of misuse or violation of these terms.
profile.terms.section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
profile.terms.section8.body: All rights in the app, including name, logo, designs, content, code, and images, are reserved by their owners. Do not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without prior written permission.
profile.terms.section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
profile.terms.section9.body: The service is provided as-is and as available. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages or loss of profits arising from use of the app. You are solely responsible for use and for content you submit.
profile.terms.section10.title: 10. Availability and Service Changes
profile.terms.section10.body: There may be interruptions, malfunctions, or maintenance work. We may update, change, or discontinue the service, in whole or in part, from time to time.
profile.terms.section11.title: 11. Third Parties
profile.terms.section11.body: The app may include links to or services from third parties, such as payment or messaging services. We are not responsible for those sites or services, and their terms will apply to your use of them.
profile.terms.section12.title: 12. Use by Minors
profile.terms.section12.body: If you are not of legal age under applicable law, app use requires consent from a parent or legal guardian.
profile.terms.section13.title: 13. Updating the Terms
profile.terms.section13.body: We may update these terms from time to time. Publishing an updated version in the app constitutes notice of change. Continued use after the update constitutes consent to the updated text.
profile.terms.section14.title: 14. Contact
profile.terms.section14.body: For questions, issues, or requests regarding these terms or the service, you can contact us using the business contact details shown in the app.

support.header: Need help? Contact Slotlys support team
support.description: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues you may have. Whether you need help with appointments, account settings, or technical support, we're ready to help. Please use the contact button below to reach out to us directly.
